product_overview: VAYRA is a premium SaaS platform designed to help users overcome debt, build savings, and generate income through AI-powered financial coaching and behavioral psychology, wrapped in a polished, responsive, and accessible UI/UX experience. The frontend supports Firebase Authentication, plan-based access, multi-language and currency toggles, progressive web app features, and premium-level polish.
core_goals: Provide secure and seamless user authentication with email/password and Google sign-in.
Deliver plan-based access control covering Free, Starter, Pro, and Premium tiers with clear upgrade paths.
Offer a responsive, premium SaaS UI with dark/light themes, multi-language and currency support.
Ensure branding consistency and polished visual animations across all screens, including logo use and motion.
Enable a PWA experience with offline support and installability on multiple platforms.
Meet high accessibility standards with WCAG 2.1 AA compliance and zero critical axe violations.
Achieve high performance and SEO scores with Lighthouse ≥90 on mobile and desktop.
Protect routes correctly to ensure users are directed based on authentication and subscription plan.
Provide error handling with user-friendly messages for auth and plan gating flows.
key_features: Authentication System with email/password and Google sign-in, including session management and error handling.
Plan Management with tiered access control, upgrade pages, and plan gating for features like Dashboard access.
A comprehensive UI component library including theme switcher, currency switcher, language selector, navigations, and notification systems.
Responsive layout system with sidebar navigation, header, and dedicated content areas.
Landing Page with hero section featuring animated VAYRA logo, clear branding, and call-to-action.
Dashboard with overview and analytics components visible only for authorized users.
PWA support with manifest, service worker, icons, and offline capabilities.
Internationalization with i18next for multiple languages and dynamic UI text changes.
Theme Management supporting light/dark modes with system preference detection.
Currency Management for multi-currency support matching user preferences.
Error handling components that catch and display graceful error messages.
Robust client-side routing with protected routes, redirecting unauthenticated or plan-limited users appropriately.
user_flow_summary: User visits landing page and views hero with an animated VAYRA logo and clear branding.
New or returning users sign up or sign in via email/password or Google authentication; errors show friendly messages.
Authenticated users with Free plan attempting to access Dashboard are redirected to Upgrade page.
Users on Starter plan and above can access Dashboard with analytics and overview panels.
Users can switch themes, languages, and currencies at any time via UI controls.
The platform supports navigation from public landing to auth pages to protected dashboard routes.
PWA features allow users to install the app and use it offline with cached assets and data.
Accessibility features enable keyboard navigation, focus outlines, and screen reader support across all pages.
validation_criteria: VAYRA branding assets load without 404 errors including /brand/vayra-logo.svg and all icons.
Landing page hero logo is single, crisp, and responds to viewport sizes with animations.
Favicons and PWA manifest icons respond with HTTP 200 and adhere to maskable icon standard.
Navigation routing restricts unauthenticated users from accessing /dashboard by redirecting to /auth/sign-in.
Plan gating correctly redirects Free plan users to /upgrade and permits Starter+ plans to access Dashboard.
Authentication error messages are descriptive for common Firebase errors like unauthorized domain and email already in use.
No critical accessibility violations detected by axe-core on landing and auth pages.
Lighthouse audits for mobile and desktop show scores ≥90 in performance, accessibility, best practices, and SEO.
Console logs are clean with no errors or warnings on tested routes (/ , /auth/sign-in, /dashboard).
Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion settings and do not cause layout shifts or long tasks exceeding 200ms.
